column1: We should work to give all groups an equal chance to succeed.ª
Social inequality in Austria is just too big.ª
It is unjust to try to make groups equal.ª
Every society requires some groups to be on top and others to be on the bottom.ª
Our country needs people who oppose traditions and try out different ideas.             a,c
This country would flourish if young people paid more attention to traditions and values.             a,c
Respect for authority is something all children need to learn.             b
Some acts are wrong on the grounds that they are unnatural.             b
